metadata.title: CVE-2023-36053 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
In Django 3.2 before 3.2.20, 4 before 4.1.10, and 4.2 before 4.2.3,EmailValidator and URLValidator are subject to a potential ReDoS (regularexpression denial of service) attack via a very large number of domain namelabels of emails and URLs.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-36053` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python3-django - 3:3.2.20-1.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: python-django package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3:3.2.20-1.1').
